ygData.subject: Re: Chains secretly nerfed?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had the same problem, but I pegged it on my 290ms ping (up from the usual 130ms) and 10% PL (up from 0%).  After suffering with this atrocious connection
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 6 Nov 1999, Brangwen wrote:
> > From: silky@...
> >
> > Oh - anyone else notice buffs not lasting as long either?
>
> Yeah. And it's not just me either, most in my guild have commented on the
> same thing! I've also noticed some of my songs effects aren't lasting as
> long so I have to fire them up in my medley of songs (some call it juggling)
> sooner than before.... What's up with that??? Any ideas??

I had the same problem, but I pegged it on my 290ms ping (up
from the usual 130ms) and 10% PL (up from 0%). After
suffering with this atrocious connection for 2 weeks, last
night was back to normal and I didn't notice anything
different with song durations. I did have a problem with my
timing - I think I'm sensing about an extra 1/10th second of
delay between when I hit a key/click a button and when the
action is reflected. Maybe they added some more client-side
processing.

Maybe I can upgrade to a faster machine... :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
